title: ESPN the Magazine font...
content:
Anyone know this font? Reminds me of Bookman merged with a few others.

The "g" in the top of the headline is distinct.

Anyone know it? i really like it.

thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621112556im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fontID_5640.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621112556im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fontID2_6562.jpg)
author: efthomas

comments.content:
Fairplex by Emigre.

If you want to see more great examples of the use of this wonderful font, check out Los Angeles Magazine.
